name: Kennpocolypse
description:
Kennpocolypse is a simple top down shooter game currently in development, music made by a personal friend, 3d assets mostly from Kenneys website, its meant to take you back to the PS3 top down shooter era, it'll feature 6 levels, co-op gameplay, and much more. early builds are currently open on my patreon(link below), where for $3 you get access to the current early builds, and for $6 you'll be given early access builds, and a free copy of the game once it releases!

On top of the patreon links, I also offer the first early access build on here for free, it only features the tutorial, main menu, and level one, which doesn't include ps4 controller support, is more buggy, and is missing some other features(Including level 2), but should give you a feeling for the game. feel free to check the game out, and decide whether or not you want to support the development later!

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Kennpocolypse

Game discord server: https://discord.gg/5gH98xAYYb
